---
title: "launch.json"
---

## High-level description
This file is a Visual Studio Code (VS Code) launch configuration file for a Django project named Lotus. It defines two debug configurations that allow developers to run and debug the Lotus application within VS Code.

## Code Structure
The file contains a JSON object with a "configurations" array, which includes two launch configurations: "Lotus Debug" and "Lotus Free Roam".

## Symbols

### Configuration: Lotus Debug
#### Description
This configuration is set up to run Django tests for the Lotus project.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| name | string | The name of the configuration |
| type | string | Specifies that this is a Python configuration |
| request | string | Indicates that this configuration launches a new process |
| program | string | The path to the Django manage.py file |
| args | array | Specifies the command to run (in this case, "test") |
| console | string | Sets the console to use for output |
| django | boolean | Enables Django-specific debugging features |
| justMyCode | boolean | When false, allows debugging of external libraries |

#### Internal Logic
This configuration runs the Django test command using the manage.py file located in the workspace folder.

### Configuration: Lotus Free Roam
#### Description
This configuration is set up to run the Django development server for the Lotus project.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| name | string | The name of the configuration |
| type | string | Specifies that this is a Python configuration |
| request | string | Indicates that this configuration launches a new process |
| program | string | The path to the Django manage.py file |
| args | array | Specifies the command to run (in this case, "runserver") |
| console | string | Sets the console to use for output |
| django | boolean | Enables Django-specific debugging features |
| justMyCode | boolean | When false, allows debugging of external libraries |

#### Internal Logic
This configuration runs the Django development server using the manage.py file located in the workspace folder.

## Dependencies
This configuration file assumes the presence of a Django project with a manage.py file in the workspace root directory.

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| version | string | "0.2.0" | Specifies the version of the launch configuration format |
